item.title: Linux system in an hour or less
item.description: “ When you donâ€™t create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow and exclude people. so create. ” — why the lucky stiff Consider the following question from section II: Audience of Linux From Scratch (LFS) project: Why go through all the hassle of manually building a Linux system from scratch when you can just download and install an existing one?
